Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: ファム
Entry.EnglishText: Pham

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツ
Entry.EnglishText: Frantz

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカから来た客
Entry.EnglishText: Visitor from Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: 装飾品・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Accessory and Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴り、なんなのかしら…… とても怖いわ……さらわれて お城にいた時と同じ感じなの……
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-Why is the ground rumbling...? I'm scared... I feel like I did when I was held captive in the castle...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何もなければいいけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope nothing bad happens...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア！ クレアでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Claire! Is that you, Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: 元気？
Entry.EnglishText: How are you?

Entry.JapaneseText: え、ええ……
Entry.EnglishText: I... I'm doing fine...

Entry.JapaneseText: そう……私はお城から 帰ってきてからずっと 体が重くて……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been feeling fatigued ever since I've returned from the castle...

Entry.JapaneseText: それに…… 毎晩、さらわれた時の夢を見て 怖くて目が覚めちゃうし……
Entry.EnglishText: And every night, I wake up scared because I dream about the time when I was kidnapped...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は悪い事をしていないのに、 なぜこんな思いをしなければ いけないの？
Entry.EnglishText: Why do I have to feel this way? I haven't even done anything wrong!

Entry.JapaneseText: いつ、突然、この街から 去らなければいけない時が 来るかわかりません。
Entry.EnglishText: You never know when you'll have to leave this town.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、たまにこうして ぼんやり、この街の美しさを 眺めてるんです。
Entry.EnglishText: That's why I'm trying to relax and take in the scenery whenever I get the chance.

Entry.JapaneseText: オークションに参加する人たちなら 街の中にいるはずよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you're searching for those attending the auction, they should be around town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 盗賊がオークション会場を 襲ったらしいわね……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that bandits attacked the auction house.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は悪い事をしていないのに、 なぜこんな思いをしなければ いけないの？
Entry.EnglishText: Why do I have to feel this way? I haven't even done anything wrong!

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様がベルサスで 演説したんですってね……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Her Majesty, Agarte gave a speech in Belsas...

Entry.JapaneseText: 話の内容を聞いたんだけど、 なんだか女王様っていうより クレアの話みたいに感じたの。 どうしてかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: When I heard about what she was talking about, it reminded me of something Claire would say more than the Queen. I wonder why...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の演説の噂は聞いた？ あの優しい方が、戦いを決意するなんて よほど世の中がメチャクチャなのね……
Entry.EnglishText: Have you heard about Lady Zilva's speech? For a woman as kind as her to consider resorting to violence... What is this world coming to?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア！ 会いに来てくれたのね。 この前マヤも来てくれたのよ。 その時に聞いたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire! I'm so glad you came. Maya visited me the other day, and told me about what's going on in Razilda...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダでは軍が介入してから、 ガジュマとヒューマで ケンカをしなくなったかわりに
Entry.EnglishText: She told me that after the military intervened, the Huma and Gajuma stopped fighting.

Entry.JapaneseText: 言い争いが絶えなくて、 よけいに険悪な雰囲気らしいわ。
Entry.EnglishText: However, now they're arguing all the time instead, and things there seem more tense than ever.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街でもガジュマとヒューマの いざこざが表面化しつつあるし…… カレギアはどうなっちゃうのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Even here, there's been unrest between Huma and Gajuma gradually rearing its head... I wonder what will happen to Callegea?

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアは大丈夫よね？
Entry.EnglishText: Is Callegea gonna be okay?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……私、わからない。 ラジルダがなくなるなんて…… マヤは故郷を失ってしまったのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... I don't know what to think. I can't believe Razilda was destroyed... Maya has lost her hometown.

Entry.JapaneseText: それなのに私は、一緒に暮らそうとしか 言う事ができなくて…… 他になんて言って励ませばいいのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: And yet, all I can do for her is offer to let her live with me... What else can I say to encourage her?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたのやさしさにマヤは 感謝していると思うわ。 だから、そんなに思いつめないで。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure Maya is grateful for your kindness, so don't be so hard on yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうでないと、あなたを頼って 暮らしているマヤは よけいに不安になってしまうわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't stop being so hard on yourself, you'll make Maya more anxious as well. ...She's counting on you.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……そうよね。 私がしっかりしないとね。
Entry.EnglishText: You're right, Claire. I need to get a grip, don't I?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、マヤと二人で 頑張ってみるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Maya and I will do our best.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無事だったか。 大丈夫だとは思ってたけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like everyone's all right. Well, I had figured that everything would turn out well in the end.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>の手がかりが 見つかったヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: We found a clue about the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当かい？
Entry.EnglishText: Did you now?

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエンじゃなくて、 ノルゼンのほうにあるんだって!!
Entry.EnglishText: It's not around Kyogen, but near Nolzen!

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼンに…… 確かに、あの辺りにも キョグエンのと似た言い伝えが あったような気がする。
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen? Now that you mention it... I do seem to recall that Nolzen has similar legends to the ones here in Kyogen.

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツさんも一緒に行く？
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't you come with us?

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう。 だが、小生はもう少しこの辺りを 調べてみようと思う。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks for the invitation. However, I think I'll do a little more investigating here.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか。じゃあ、 ボクたちは先に行くネ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, okay. Well, we're going to go on ahead, then!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、またどこかで会おう。
Entry.EnglishText: Sure. We'll meet again someday.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、また会おう!!
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah! See you later!

Entry.JapaneseText: 遅いじゃないか。 早く会場に案内してくれ。 待ちきれないよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: What took you so long? Take me to the auction house and be quick about it. I'm sick of waiting!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
